Meta.title: Critical Sure Hit
Meta.author: zwa73
Meta.description:
此Mod覆写了CalcHit函数, 上调暴击判定时机到命中对抗前 使你的暴击像ElonaPlus里那样必定能击中目标
This mod overrides the CalcHit function, moving the critical hit check to occur before the hit/miss check. As a result, your critical hits will always hit the target, just like in ElonaPlus.
